adrFormatAddress: 295 Madison Ave # 705, New York, NY 10017, USA

originalText.text: Jonathan and his team helped me recover a significant amount of money for my elderly mother who was taken for a ride by her evil “financial advisor.” At first we had written the losses off… We didn’t want to get involved in a legal battle. But Jonathan and all the folks at Kurta were so patient with mom, did a great job managing mom’s expectations, coached and prepped us for interviews, made us feel really safe and most importantly, won the case and got mom’s portfolio back on track. Can’t thank them enough. Thinking back, the amount of work they did? Worth every bit of their share of the award money and then some. These are nice people helping people. Trust them. - D

originalText.text:
This is a review on Kurta Law and specifically Jonathan Kurta.  Jonathan reached out to me a few months back and was representing a group to recover funds on a stock loss.  When I first discussed the issue he was very easy to talk to and I didn't feel pressured to join.  After talking with him I agreed to move forward and he kept me informed as progress was made and ultimately got an excellent outcome.  This is especially eventful due to the fact that the case was older than aloud but we still won the case.  I highly recommend this company and Jonathan.

Mike

originalText.text: My experience with Kurta Law was very positive.   Everyone was highly professional, transparent, and direct.  They communicated regularly and clearly.  I believe they represented my best interest and negotiated skillfully on my behalf, obtaining the best settlement possible.   I recommend Kurta Law without reservation.

text.text: My experience with Kurta Law was very positive.   Everyone was highly professional, transparent, and direct.  They communicated regularly and clearly.  I believe they represented my best interest and negotiated skillfully on my behalf, obtaining the best settlement possible.   I recommend Kurta Law without reservation.

originalText.text:
We are happy to provide a 5 star review for Kurta Law.
Although the object of our case was complicated, and quite
upsetting for us as it impacted a large portion of our stock holding,
Jonathan Kurta was the perfect person for the job.
He guided us through the process and was successful in getting a great settlement for a situation where we had no hope.
Jonathan was always responsive in a timely fashion.
His work made an otherwise horrible legal issue come to a good outcome for us.
We are thankful for Jonathan's expertise, efforts, personality and his work ethic.
Thank you Jonathan.
Thank you Kurta Law.
Fondly,
John and Bonnie Nikituk

originalText.text: Jonathan Kurta and the Kurta Law team were immensely helpful to us in recovering a significant amount of money seemingly lost forever due to an unscrupulous financial advisor.  From day one, Jonathan was very straight-forward and patient as well as determined to achieve a satisfying result.  Importantly, he remained optimistic, yet realistic throughout the year-long process.  In spite of the fact that we live in Europe now and have never actually met Jonathan in person, he made certain that we were kept up-to-date and fully informed at each step of the way.  In the end, the result was far beyond what we had hoped to recover and we owe the success of the procedure to the diligence and professionalism of the Kurta team.  Justice was indeed served.
